column2: Mostly sunny- mid-80's- light breeze. One loon- 1 kingbird- 2 cedar waxwings- several tree swallows- dragonflies- damselflies- 3 carp.
Clear- light breeze. One osprey- one mature bald eagle
Zero turtles seen - very unusual as it was sunny and there are plenty of logs for sunning.
mostly clear- very light breeze- 75 degrees. Considerable filamentous algae visible in sheltered bays. Saw one bald eagle- one painted turtle- several carp bubble trails.
